jobFunctions.title: Job Function 1
jobFunctions.description: Plan a set of software development requirements to estimate personal time and effort required to deliver a piece of work and enable accurate costs to be established

jobFunctions.title: Job Function 2
jobFunctions.description: Analyze and convert customer requirements into technical requirements, both functional and non-functional to ensure that customers' expectations are accurately reflected in the software products developed.

jobFunctions.title: Job Function 3
jobFunctions.description: Identify and design the most appropriate technical solution, taking into consideration coding best practice and appropriate quality standards.

jobFunctions.title: Job Function 4
jobFunctions.description: Write and implement a logical and maintainable software solution to meet the design and organizational coding standards

jobFunctions.title: Job Function 5
jobFunctions.description: Perform testing of the software solution to ensure a high quality output and deploy a suitably documented solution to the customer for their use

jobFunctions.title: Job Function 6
jobFunctions.description: Respond appropriately to given Service Level Agreements (SLA) to ensure that time and resources invested in software development activity are allocated appropriately to maintain good customer service.
